text: The Jiabao V75 and the Jiabao V77 is a five- to eight-seater Microvan made by FAW Jilin under the Jiabao sub-brand, with the V77 being the long version based on the V75. ==Overview== FAW Jiabao V77 rear Launched in 2015, the Jiabao V75 was powered by a 75 hp 1.0 liter Inline-three petrol engine and the Jiabao V77 was powered by either a 75 hp 1.0 liter Inline-four petrol engine or a 88 hp 1.3 liter Inline-four petrol engine. With the Jiabao V75 priced between 28,900 yuan and 30,900 yuan, and the longer Jiabao V77 priced between 30,900 yuan and 35,900 yuan. it also spawned a 304mm longer version called the Jiabao V55 with a single model priced at 32,900 yuan and powered by the same engine. ==References== ==External links== *Official Jiabao V75/V77 website Jiabao V75 Category:Rear-wheel-drive vehicles Category:Microvans Category:2010s cars Category:Cars introduced in 2015 Category:Cars of China
title: Jiabao V75
